title: Ezhu mAmalaigaL
sahitya:
Ezhu mAmalaigaL shUzha uLLavE Ezhai eppaDi Eri selluvEn


anupallavi

  tUla prANa sUkSma vigjnAna Ananda turiya cittu sattAm peria kOTTaogaLAi


caraNam    kaNNait-tirandun karuNait-tuNai tandu kaDait-tErum vazhi kATTi AluvAi
maNNuDaluDanE unnai nAn kalandE mAsilAda paramA kAsa jyOtiyAga
